line_1: First, Sir, I read; and then I Breakfast;
line_2: As soon as Phoebus' Rays inspect us,

line_1: All the People at Bath to a general Breakfast.
line_2: And To-day with extreme Complaisance and Respect ask'd

line_1: So when we had wasted more Bread at a Breakfast
line_2: Than the poor of our Parish have ate for this Week past,
